title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.6 - Lost articles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.6 - Lost articles

State Regulations

Any person finding lost articles at a terminal shall
deposit them at the office of the manager. Articles unclaimed by the owners in
90 days will be turned over to the finders thereof, unless found by Port

Authority employees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
